Title: Like People
Writer: Stephen Falk (created by), Alison Bennett, Eva Anderson, Philippe Iujvidin (story editor)
Actors: Chris Geere, Aya Cash, Desmin Borges, Kether Donohue
Plot: Gretchen spends the day with Boone and his daughter in an attempt to distract herself from having slept with Jimmy the previous night, while Jimmy tries to prove to himself he's moved on. ...
